article_title: Prospect of a Donald Trump Nomination Scares Senate Republicans
article_text:
Things are getting tense with the Republicans – and it’s not just the presidential candidates.

The dominance of real estate magnate Donald Trump has incumbent GOP candidates worried about getting the turnout needed to keep their Senate seats.

With Democrats needing to pick up just five seats to regain the majority (four if a Democrat is elected president), the Senate angst extends to the national party.

article_metadata.title: Prospect of a Donald Trump Nomination Scares Senate Republicans

og.description: Republicans are starting to fear the chaotic presidential race could hurt their Senate chances in 2016.
